sentences.content: 对不起，你拨打的用户已结婚
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 作为失败的典型，你其实很成功
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 不要迷恋哥，嫂子会揍你
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 多谢你的绝情，让我学会死心
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 上班的心情比上坟还要沉重
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 別說我很高傲,只昰我拒絕与禽獸打交道
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 都说女人是衣服,姐是你们穿不起的牌子
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 哥,不寂寞。因为有寂寞陪着哥
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 姐从来不说人话，姐一直说的是神话
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 知识就像内裤，看不见但很重要
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 世上只有妈妈好,爸爸也不错
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 性别：男，爱好：女
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 还没来得及去沾花惹草,就被人拔光了
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 你是我的优乐美这样我喝完就可以把你扔掉咯
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 谁是谁的老公, 都他M的是临时工
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 只想优雅转身，不料华丽撞墙
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 永远有多远？你小子就给我滚多远！
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 90后的你有着一颗80后的心和一张70后的脸…
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 小时候缺钙,长大了缺爱
sentences.author: brant

sentences.content: 我就是巴黎欧莱雅，你值得拥有！
sentences.author: brant
